summary.span: 表示一个服务，该服务为类型转换器和标记扩展提供 XAML 架构上下文信息。

span.span: Represents a service that provides XAML schema context information to type converters and markup extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务提供了一个属性 。The service provides one property, . 当需要来自标记扩展或类型转换器实现的活动 XAML 架构上下文时，可使用该服务及其属性。Use the service and its property when you need the active XAML schema context from a markup extension or type converter implementation. 许多与 XAML 相关的操作（特别是将 XAML 类型解析为对象图创建的支持类型）都依赖于具有可用的 XAML 架构上下文。Many XAML-related operations, most notably resolving a XAML type into its backing type for object graph creation, rely on having an available XAML schema context. 但在许多情况下，你可以使用特定框架提供的 XAML 架构上下文。However, for many scenarios, you can use the XAML schema context that is provided by a particular framework. 或者，你可以使用 .NET Framework XAML 服务提供的默认 XAML 架构上下文，该上下文使用 CLR 和反射支持，并可为任何 CLR 定义的类型提供必要的 XAML 架构上下文。Or you can use the default XAML schema context provided by .NET Framework XAML Services, which uses CLR and reflection backing and can provide the necessary XAML schema context for any CLR-defined type. 服务主要与实现有关，这些实现预计在自定义 XAML 架构上下文支持时，可以调用其值转换器实现。The service is mainly relevant for implementations that anticipate that their value converter implementation might be called when it is supported by custom XAML schema contexts. 你可以从 或报表服务上下文的虚方法的入口点参数获取该服务 。You can get the service from the entry-point parameters of the virtual methods of or that report service context. 您也可以改为直接从特定 XAML 读取器或 XAML 编写器的专用属性获取架构上下文。Or you can instead get the schema context directly from dedicated properties of specific XAML readers or XAML writers.
